subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Super Bowl
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Amid anger over public financing of the Marlins’ new baseball stadium, Florida lawmakers are pondering using $200 million in taxes to help the Dolphins renovate their stadium.
snippet: Amid anger over public financing of the Marlins’ new baseball stadium, Florida lawmakers are pondering using $200 million in taxes to help the Dolphins renovate their stadium.
